visits.text: Discovery of the maritime fortress of Suomenlinna, UNESCO-listed, spread across seven islands and tracing Finnish military history.
Visit to Helsinki Cathedral, neoclassical masterpiece dominating Senate Square.
Stroll through Esplanadi Park, large central park perfect for relaxing and observing local life.
Return to Helsinki for a walk in the Kallio district, dynamic and alternative.
Discovery of the Helsinki design museum.

activities.text: Discovery of Finnish design in the shops and galleries of the Design District.
Seaside walk at Kauppatori market square.
Shopping in Finnish boutiques downtown and tasting local coffee.
Evening stroll on the south harbor to admire the city lights.

days_plan.itin_title: Finland's Arctic Circle Journey: Helsinki Design to Lapland Wilderness
Finland's Arctic Circle Journey: Helsinki Design to Lapland Wilderness

visits.text: Town of Loviisa (historic center and wooden houses)
Malmgård Manor (exteriors, park and agricultural estate)
Strömfors Ironworks (Ruotsinpyhtää) — preserved industrial village
Valkmusa National Park — boardwalks and observation tower
Sapokka Water Garden (waterfalls, pools and award-winning flower beds)
Katariina Seaside Park (headlands, maritime areas and views)
Vellamo Maritime Centre (maritime, coast guard, Kymenlaakso museums)
Langinkoski (former imperial fishing lodge, banks of the Kymijoki)

activities.text: River excursion in Strömfors (calm canoeing depending on season)
Boat crossing to Varissaari island (small forts, wrecks and trails)
Kiulu floating sauna (wellness session in small harbor, subject to availability)

days_plan.itin_title: Southeast Finland's Lake District: Archipelago Towns & Sauna Culture
Southeast Finland's Lake District: Archipelago Towns & Sauna Culture

visits.text: Hamina — fortress trail (circular heritage route, bastions)
Historic center of Hamina (wooden houses and religious buildings)
Verla cardboard factory (UNESCO) — factory village and exhibitions
Repovesi National Park (bridges, cliffs and lakes — classic loop)
Mustila Arboretum (giant conifers, rhododendron valley)
Ankkapurha district (museums, industrial heritage, architecture)

activities.text: Panoramic walk on the ramparts and viewpoints of Hamina
Tykkimäki (amusement park / water park depending on season)
Käyrälampi — swimming, paddling or mountain biking around the lake (depending on season)

days_plan.itin_title: Southeast Finland's Lake District: Archipelago Towns & Sauna Culture
Southeast Finland's Lake District: Archipelago Towns & Sauna Culture

visits.text: Old Porvoo (cobblestone streets, wooden houses, cathedral and riverbanks)
J. L. Runeberg House (museum of the national poet)
Albert Edelfelt Museum-Studio (painter's summer work site)
Taidehalli / Art Hall of Porvoo (contemporary art exhibitions)
Porvoo Museum – Holm House (18th-century merchant interiors)

activities.text: Porvoo Archipelago — Kråkö island (walk, workshops and gardens)

days_plan.itin_title: Southeast Finland's Lake District: Archipelago Towns & Sauna Culture

visits.text: Discovery of Santa Claus Village, on the Arctic Circle, symbol of Lapland.
Visit to the Korundi cultural center housing the Rovaniemi Art Museum and the Lapland Chamber Orchestra.
Northern lights observation in the surroundings of Rovaniemi.

activities.text: Snowmobile or dog sled ride in the Lapland forests.
Tasting of traditional Lapland dishes like reindeer stew.

days_plan.itin_title: Finland's Arctic Circle Journey: Helsinki Design to Lapland Wilderness

visits.text: Visit to the medieval castle of Olavinlinna, built in the 15th century on an island in Lake Saimaa.
Exploration of the old town of Savonlinna and its streets lined with traditional shops and cafés.
Discovery of Kerimäki Church, the largest wooden church in the world.

activities.text: Boat trip on Lake Saimaa to observe Saimaa seals.
Visit to the local market of Savonlinna to taste smoked fish and regional specialties.

days_plan.itin_title: Finland's Arctic Circle Journey: Helsinki Design to Lapland Wilderness

visits.text: Kuusijärvi recreational area (forest and lake access on the edge of Sipoonkorpi)
Sipoonkorpi National Park — Byabäcken trail (easy nature loop)
Village of Nikkilä — old and new churches (15th c. and 19th c.)
Former Nikkilä psychiatric hospital estate (outdoor heritage walk)
Gumbostrand Konst & Form (seaside art gallery and center)

activities.text: Traditional sauna and swimming at Lake Kuusijärvi
Excursion in the Sipoo archipelago (kayak or boat to Norrkullalandet, barbecue areas and observation tower)

days_plan.itin_title: Southeast Finland's Lake District: Archipelago Towns & Sauna Culture

visits.text: Visit to the historic ruins of Vanhan Vaasa, remains of the old town destroyed by fire.
Discovery of Korsholm church, built in 1862, typical example of neo-Gothic style.
Exploration of the Brage open-air museum to discover the rural culture of Ostrobothnia.

activities.text: Walk along the Vaasa coastline and its numerous cycling paths.
Relaxation on the Kvarken islands, UNESCO World Heritage listed.

days_plan.itin_title: Finland's Arctic Circle Journey: Helsinki Design to Lapland Wilderness

visits.text: Aviapolis district (urban exploration around the airport)
Finnish Aviation Museum (two hangars with aircraft and exhibitions)
Heureka, science center in Tikkurila (interactive exhibitions)
Tikkurilankoski urban leisure park and banks of the Keravanjoki river
Fazer Experience visitor center (brand discovery tour and museum)

activities.text: Street-art urban walk in Myyrmäki (Artsi and outdoor murals)

days_plan.itin_title: Southeast Finland's Lake District: Archipelago Towns & Sauna Culture
